description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
58 Pemberton Gardens, Islington, London, N19 5RU

TPO Reference:
T1- Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.385) 2007
T2 & T3 London Planes of LBI TPO (No.385) 2007

PO Number:
T100397

Work specifications:

1 x Sycamore (T1) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.385) 2007
Fell to ground level and treat stumps with appropriate herbicide

2 x London Planes (T2&T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.385) 2007
Fell to ground level and treat stumps with appropriate herbicide
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The council requires three Hornbeams (Carpinus betulus) of a minimum of 14-16 cm in diameter, to be planted with 2-3m  of the London Planes and the Sycamore. The replacement trees shall be planted in accordance with the details so approved during the first planting season after the tree removal. The trees planted must have a two year maintenance/watering provision commencing after the date it is planted. Any tree that dies within five years of planting shall be replaced to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with the same species or an approved alternative.

REASON: To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained in accordance with policy Env6 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
